Verses: 1 en Pillaigale, Neengal Paavancheyyaadhapadikku Ivaigalai Ungalukku Ezhudhugiren; Oruvan Paavancheyvaanaanaal Needhipararaayirukkira Yesukiristhu Namakkaagap Pidhaavinidaththil Parindhu Pesugiravaraayirukkiraar.
2 nammudaiya Paavangalai Nivirththi Seygira Kirubaadhaarabali Avare; Nammudaiya Paavangalai Maaththiram Alla, Sarvalogaththin Paavangalaiyum Nivirththiseygira Baliyaayirukkiraar.
3 avarudaiya Karpanaigalai Naam Kaikkollugiravargalaanaal, Avarai Arindhirukkiromenbadhai Adhinaal Arivom.
4 avarai Arindhirukkirenendru Solliyum, Avarudaiya Karpanaigalaik Kaikkollaadhavan Poiyanaayirukkiraan, Avanukkul Saththiyamillai.
5 avarudaiya Vasanaththaik Kaikkollugiravanidaththil Dheva Anbu Meyyaagap Pooranappattirukkum; Naam Avarukkul Irukkiromenbadhai Adhinaale Arindhirukkirom.
6 avarukkul Nilaiththirukkirenendru Sollugiravan, Avar Nadandhapadiye Thaanum Nadakkavendum.
7 sagodharare, Naan Ungalukkup Pudhiya Karpanaiyai Alla, Aadhimudhal Neengal Petrirukkira Pazhaiya Karpanaiyaiye Ezhudhugiren; Andhap Pazhaiya Karpanai Neengal Aadhimudhal Kettirukkira Vasanandhaane.
8 melum, Naan Pudhiya Karpanaiyaiyum Ungalukku Ezhudhugiren, Idhu Avarukkullum Ungalukkullum Meyyaayirukkiradhu; Enendraal, Irul Neengippogiradhu, Meyyaana Oli Ippozhudhu Piragaasikkiradhu.
9 oliyile Irukkiren Endru Solliyum Than Sagodharanaip Pagaikkiravan Idhuvaraikkum Irulile Irukkiraan.
10 than Sagodharanidaththil Anbukoorugiravan Oliyile Nilaikondirukkiraan; Avanidaththil Idaral Ondrumillai.
11 than Sagodharanaip Pagaikkiravan Irulile Irundhu Irulile Nadakkiraan; Irulaanadhu Avan Kangalaik Kurutaakkinapadiyaal Thaan Pogumidam Innadhendru Ariyaadhirukkiraan.
12 pillaigale, Avarudaiya Naamaththinimiththam Ungal Paavangal Mannikkappattirukkiradhinaal Ungalukku Ezhudhugiren.

13 pidhaakkale, Aadhimudhalirukkiravarai Neengal Arindhirukkiradhinaal Ungalukku Ezhudhugiren. Vaalibare, Pollaanganai Neengal Jeyiththadhinaal Ungalukku Ezhudhugiren. Pillaigale Neengal Pidhaavai Arindhirukkiradhinaal Ungalukku Ezhudhugiren.

14 pidhaakkale, Aadhimudhalirukkiravarai Neengal Arindhirukkiradhinaal Ungalukku Ezhudhiyirukkiren. Vaalibare, Neengal Balavaangalaayirukkiradhinaalum, Dhevavasanam Ungalil Nilaiththirukkiradhinaalum, Neengal Pollaanganai Jeyiththadhinaalum, Ungalukku Ezhudhiyirukkiren.
15 ulagaththilum Ulagaththilullavaigalilum Anbukooraadhirungal; Oruvan Ulagaththil Anbukoorndhaal Avanidaththil Pidhaavin Anbillai.
16 enenil, Maamsaththin Ichchaiyum, Kangalin Ichchaiyum, Jeevanaththin Perumaiyumaagiya Ulagaththilullavaigalellaam Pidhaavinaalundaanavaigalalla, Avaigal Ulagaththinaalundaanavaigal.
17 ulagamum Adhin Ichchaiyum Ozhindhupom; Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinpadi Seygiravano Endrendraikkum Nilaiththiruppaan.

18 pillaigale, Idhu Kadaisikkaalamaayirukkiradhu; Andhikkiristhu Varugiraanendru Neengal Kelvippattapadi Ippozhudhum Anega Andhikkiristhugal Irukkiraargal; Adhinaale Idhu Kadaisikkaalamendru Arigirom.

19 avargal Nammaivittup Pirindhu Ponaargal,aagilum Avargal Nammudaiyavargalaayirukkavillai; Nammudaiyavargalaayirundhaargalaanaal Nammudane Nilaiththiruppaargale; Ellaarum Nammudaiyavargalallavendru Veliyaagumpadikke Pirindhuponaargal.
20 neengal Parisuththaraale Abishegam Petru Sagalaththaiyum Arindhirukkireergal.

21 saththiyaththai Neengal Ariyaadhadhinaalalla, Neengal Saththiyaththai Arindhirukkiradhinaalum Saththiyaththinaal Oru Poiyumundaayiraadhenbadhai Neengal Arindhirukkiradhinaalum, Ungalukku Ezhudhiyirukkiren.
22 yesuvaikkiristhu Alla Endru Marudhalikkiravaneyallaamal Vere Yaar Poiyan? Pidhaavaiyum Kumaaranaiyum Marudhalikkiravane Andhikkiristhu.
23 kumaaranai Marudhalikkiravan Pidhaavai Udaiyavanalla, Kumaaranai Arikkaiyidugiravan Pidhaavaiyum Udaiyavanaayirukkiraan.

24 aagaiyaal Aadhimudhal Neengal Kelvippattadhu Ungalil Nilaiththirukkakkadavadhu; Aadhimudhal Neengal Kelvippattadhu Ungalil Nilaiththirundhaal, Neengalum Kumaaranilum Pidhaavilum Nilaiththiruppeergal.
25 niththiya Jeevanai Alippenenbadhe Avar Namakku Seydha Vaakkuththaththam.
26 ungalai Vanjikkiravargalaik Kuriththu Ivaigalai Ungalukku Ezhudhiyirukkiren.

27 neengal Avaraale Petra Abishegam Ungalil Nilaiththirukkiradhu, Oruvarum Ungalukku Bodhikkavenduvadhillai; Andha Abishegam Sagalaththaiyunkuriththu Ungalukku Bodhikkiradhu; Adhu Saththiyamaayirukkiradhu, Poiyalla, Adhu Ungalukku Bodhiththapadiye Avaril Nilaiththiruppeergalaaga.
28 ippadiyirukka, Pillaigale, Avar Velippadumpodhu Naam Avar Varugaiyil Avarukku Munbaaga Vetkappattuppogaamal Dhairiyamullavargalaayirukkumpadi Avaril Nilaiththirungal.
29 avar Needhiyullavaraayirukkiraarendru Ungalukkuth Therindhiruppadhinaal, Needhiyai Seygiravanevanum Avaril Pirandhavanendru Arindhirukkireergal.
